Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/QNodeEditor/include/nodes/internal/ConnectionState.hpp

1#pragma once
2#include "PortType.hpp"
3
4#include <QtCore/QUuid>
5class QPointF;
6namespace QtNodes
7{
8 class Node;
9 /// Stores currently draggind end.
10 /// Remembers last hovered Node.
11 class ConnectionState
12 {
13 public:
14 ConnectionState(PortType port = PortType::None) : _requiredPort(port)
15 {
16 }
17 ConnectionState(const ConnectionState &) = delete;
18 ConnectionState operator=(const ConnectionState &) = delete;
19 ~ConnectionState();
20
21 public:
22 void setRequiredPort(PortType end)
23 {
24 _requiredPort = end;
25 }
26 PortType requiredPort() const
27 {
28 return _requiredPort;
29 }
30 bool requiresPort() const
31 {
32 return _requiredPort != PortType::None;
33 }
34 void setNoRequiredPort()
35 {
36 _requiredPort = PortType::None;
37 }
38
39 public:
40 void interactWithNode(Node *node);
41 void setLastHoveredNode(Node *node);
42 Node *lastHoveredNode() const
43 {
44 return _lastHoveredNode;
45 }
46 void resetLastHoveredNode();
47
48 private:
49 PortType _requiredPort;
50 Node *_lastHoveredNode{ nullptr };
51 };
52} // namespace QtNodes
53
